summary: Professional dark-themed Free Fire gaming tournament website with red and black accents, featuring Home/Hero section, Tournaments List, Registration Form, Rules Page, Leaderboard, and Contact/Support sections. Mobile-responsive design.
architectural_notes: Dark theme with aggressive/modern design using red and black accents
Mobile-responsive layout so players can register from phones

existing_features.title: Apply a dark, aggressive, modern visual theme throughout the entire site using a red and black color palette. Use deep black (#0a0a0a, #111111) as backgrounds, vivid red (#e53e3e, #c0392b) as primary accent color, and white/light gray for text. Typography should be bold and impactful (e.g., heavy-weight sans-serif fonts). Include subtle glitch/neon effects, sharp angular design elements, and flame or combat-inspired decorative motifs consistent with Free Fire's aesthetic. All pages must be fully mobile-responsive.

Build a full-page Hero section on the Home page featuring: a large headline announcing the Free Fire tournament, a subtitle with tournament date/tagline, a prominent 'Register Now' call-to-action button styled in red, and a countdown timer counting down to the next tournament date. The hero should use the generated background image as its background.

Create a Tournaments List section displaying upcoming tournaments in a responsive grid layout. Each tournament card must show: tournament name, match date/time, entry fee badge (labeled 'FREE' in green or 'PAID' in red/gold), and prize pool amount. Store a static list of at least 4 sample tournaments in the backend and expose a query to retrieve them.

Create a Registration Form section/page that collects: Player Name (text), In-Game ID (text), Team Name (text), and WhatsApp Number (tel input). On submission, save the registration entry to the backend. Show a success confirmation message after successful submission. Validate that all fields are non-empty before submitting.

Create a Rules page with two sections: (1) a numbered list of gameplay rules (at least 8 rules covering fair play, squad rules, disconnection policy, cheating policy, etc.), and (2) a Points Table showing rank-to-points mapping (e.g., 1st place = 12 pts, 2nd = 9 pts, etc.) styled as a clearly readable table with alternating row colors.

Create a Leaderboard section/page displaying a ranked table of top players. Include columns for Rank, Player Name, Team Name, Total Points, and Kills. Store at least 10 sample leaderboard entries in the backend and expose a query to retrieve them sorted by total points descending. Highlight the top 3 entries with gold, silver, and bronze styling respectively.

Create a Contact/Support section at the bottom of the site (or as a dedicated page) that includes: social media icon links (YouTube, Instagram, Facebook â€” using placeholder URLs), a large 'Join Our WhatsApp Group' button, and a 'Join Discord' button. Both join buttons should be styled prominently in contrasting colors and open links in a new tab.

Build a persistent navigation bar fixed at the top of every page with links to: Home, Tournaments, Register, Rules, Leaderboard, and Contact sections/pages. The nav should collapse into a hamburger menu on mobile. Style it with a dark semi-transparent background and red accent on the active/hover link.
Render the generated hero background image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ and use it as the full-bleed background of the Home page hero section.

Create a new 'Secure Payment' section component and insert it in App.tsx immediately before the RegistrationForm section. The section must display: (1) a heading 'Secure Payment', (2) the text 'Pay the entry fee to the following UPI ID to participate: 8728872927@fam', (3) a 'Copy ID' button that copies '8728872927@fam' to the clipboard and shows a brief confirmation feedback (e.g., text changes to 'Copied!'), and (4) a note reading 'Please keep the transaction screenshot ready for the form'. The section background should use a slightly red tint (e.g., a dark red overlay or bg color like #1a0505 or rgba(229,62,62,0.10)) consistent with the existing red/black Free Fire theme. Style with bold Orbitron/Rajdhani fonts, sharp angular design elements, and red accent borders/highlights matching the site's existing aesthetic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Home Page: Bold hero section with 'Register Now' button and countdown timer for next tournament
Tournaments List: Grid view showing upcoming matches, entry fees (Free/Paid), and prize pools
Registration Form: Collect Player Name, In-game ID, Team Name, and WhatsApp number
Rules Page: Gameplay rules list and points table system
Leaderboard: Table showing top players and previous winners
Contact/Support: Social media links and 'Join Discord/WhatsApp' button
Secure Payment section before registration form: UPI ID '8728872927@fam', 'Copy ID' button, transaction screenshot note, slightly red background matching Free Fire theme
